info.title: Supplier Quotation - Create with Reference, Update, Delete
info.description: This service enables you to read, update and create supplier quotations with reference to an RFQ from or in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. The service contains header, item, and bidder nodes. The information is sent in the request as a payload. Once the supplier quotation has been successfully created, the supplier quotation number is sent in the response with the data included in the supplier quotation. If any issues arise when the supplier quotation is created, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update and create supplier quotations with reference to an RFQ from or in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this service

values.text: [Collaborative Manufacturing with SAP Digital Manufacturing Cloud(1NX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1NX " Link To BP ")
[Sourcing with SAP Ariba Sourcing(1A0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1A0 " Link To BP ")
[Supplier Quote Automation with SAP Ariba Commerce Automation(1L2)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1L2 " Link To BP ")
[Sourcing with SAP Ariba Sourcing(OA0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OA0 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Procurement: Purchasing Document (MM_PURDOC_HEADER)
* Procurement: Purchasing Document Item (MM_PURDOC_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Gets the header details of all supplier quotations in the system.
get.description: Gets the header details of all supplier quotations in the system with such details as supplier quotation ID, description, company code, creation date and time. Note, that if there are many supplier quotations in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

post.summary: Creates a header of a supplier quotation with the details passed in the request body.
post.description: Creates a header of a supplier quotation with such information as supplier quotation ID, company code, supplier, creation date and time. It is mandatory to pass the supplier quotation number "SupplierQuotation" in the request body.

parameters.name: SupplierQuotation
parameters.description: Supplier Quotation Number

get.summary: Gets the header details of a supplier quotation.
get.description: Gets the header details of a supplier quotation with such information as  company code, supplier, user who created the supplier quotation, creation date and time using the supplier quotation number provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

patch.summary: Changes the header details of a supplier quotation.
patch.description: Changes only the specified field in the supplier quotation using the field key, for example price and quantity.

delete.description: Deletes a complete supplier quotation with all included information.

parameters.name: SupplierQuotation
parameters.description: Supplier Quotation Number

get.summary: Gets details of all items from a supplier quotation.
get.description: Gets details of all items from a supplier quotation using the supplier quotation number "SupplierQuotation" provided.

get.summary: Gets details of all items from all existing supplier quotations.
get.description: Gets details of all items from all existing supplier quotations with such information as supplier quotation ID and description.

get.summary: Gets the item details from the supplier quotation.
get.description: Gets the details of an item  from the supplier quotation with such information as material and plant.

patch.description: Change the item details in a supplier quotation by key.

parameters.name: SupplierQuotation
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Number

parameters.name: SupplierQuotationItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Supplier Quotation

get.summary: Gets the header information of the supplier quotation that includes the specified items.
get.description: Gets the header information of the supplier quotation to which the specified items belong.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: SupplierQuotation
parameters.description:
Supplier Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description: Completes the bidding process. A predefined follow-up document is created from the awarded supplier quotation.

parameters.name: SupplierQuotation
parameters.description:
Supplier Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description: Cancels supplier quotation after it has been submitted. The supplier quotation gets status "Cancelled" and can be archived.

parameters.name: SupplierQuotation
parameters.description:
Supplier Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Submits a supplier quotation for approval.
post.description: Submits supplier quotation for approval. Depending on the workflow settings, the supplier quotations either is approved automatically or is sent to the approver that is defined in the workflow settings.

parameters.name: SupplierQuotation
parameters.description:
Supplier Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Creates a supplier quotation from an RFQ.
post.description: Creates a supplier quotation from a request for quotation. The item details are taken over from the RFQ.

parameters.name: QuotationSubmissionDate
parameters.description:
Quotation Submission Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: Supplier
parameters.description:
Supplier  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: RequestForQuotation
parameters.description:
Request for Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
